mapper.select:
SELECT REMAIN_VACATION
FROM TBL_VACATION WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } ORDER BY VACATION_NO DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(IF(IS_HALF_DAY, 0.5, DATEDIFF(VACATION_END_DATE, VACATION_START_DATE) - (FLOOR((DATEDIFF(VACATION_END_DATE, VACATION_START_DATE) + WEEKDAY(VACATION_START_DATE) + 1) / 7) * 2) - (CASE WHEN WEEKDAY(VACATION_START_DATE) = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) - (CASE WHEN WEEKDAY(VACATION_END_DATE) = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + 1)) AS usedDay FROM TBL_USED_VACATION A JOIN TBL_VACATION B ON A.VACATION_NO = B.VACATION_NO WHERE B.MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode }
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_VACATION B SET REMAIN_VACATION = REMAIN_VACATION - ( SELECT SUM(IF(A.IS_HALF_DAY, 0.5, DATEDIFF(A.VACATION_END_DATE, A.VACATION_START_DATE) + 1)) FROM TBL_USED_VACATION A WHERE A.VACATION_NO = B.VACATION_NO ) WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } AND VACATION_NO = #{ vacationNo }
mapper.select: SELECT A.VACATION_START_DATE, A.VACATION_END_DATE, A.VACATION_NO, A.IS_HALF_DAY, B.APP_STATUS FROM TBL_USED_VACATION A JOIN TBL_APPROVAL B ON A.MEMBER_CODE = B.MEMBER_CODE AND B.DOC_CODE = 8 WHERE A.MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } AND B.APP_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(C.APP_DATE) FROM TBL_APPROVAL C WHERE C.MEMBER_CODE = A.MEMBER_CODE AND C.DOC_CODE = 8 AND B.APP_DATE = C.APP_DATE ) ORDER BY A.VACATION_START_DATE DESC LIMIT 5
